QuestData.Title: A Bomb Deal
QuestData.Description: All my workers got driven straight out of the cavern here by those big swamp-lookin' things! Darla's sent me here to pick up the pieces, but have you seen it in there? I ain't goin' in!$B$BThere's a ton of explosives left behind that we can't just leave layin' around.$B$B I'll make you a deal: You run in there and get those explosives gathered up, and I will stay here and not get killed by swamp-things, and if you don't either, I'll pay ya! How's that sound?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Irontree Explosives from Irontree Cavern.
QuestData.CompletionText: We had a deal, right? Right?
QuestData.RewardText: Hey, nice! I'll just take those... carefully...$B$BDon't go tellin' the workers I didn't have the guts to go down there myself, you hear? Here's your pay... and a little somethin' extra.
